actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the establishment of business accounts for air travel by Federal employees to maximize costs savings, and for other purposes.
short_title: Government Air Travel Savings Act of 1993

summary.text: Government Air Travel Savings Act of 1993 - Amends Federal civil service law to provide for the establishment of business accounts for air travel by Federal employees on official business in order to maximize cost savings. Provides for similar measures with respect to air travel by Members of Congress and congressional employees.

titles.title: Government Air Travel Savings Act of 1993
A bill to provide for the establishment of business accounts for air travel by Federal employees to maximize costs savings, and for other purposes.
